try:
    logInfo("Starting HR Gender dimension setup")
    
    # Get storage account 
    storage_account = mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')
    logInfo(f"Using storage account: {storage_account}")
    
    # Fix the path - note the removal of trailing slash from storage_account
    storage_account = storage_account.rstrip('/')
    delta_view_path = f"abfss://odw-curated@{storage_account}/saphr/pbi_dim_HR_Gender"
    logInfo(f"Delta table will be created at: {delta_view_path}")
    
    logInfo("Creating view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender")
    
    spark.sql("""
    CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender AS 
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        CASE GenderKey 
            WHEN 'Male' THEN 1 
            WHEN 'Female' THEN 2 
            ELSE NULL
        END AS dim_gender_key,
        CASE GenderKey 
            WHEN 'Male' THEN 'Male'
            WHEN 'Female' THEN 'Female'
            WHEN '' THEN 'Unknown'
            WHEN NULL THEN 'NULL'
            ELSE 'Unknown'
        END AS Gender
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
    """)
    logInfo("Successfully created view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender")
    
    gender_count = spark.sql("SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender").collect()[0]['count']
    logInfo(f"View contains {gender_count} distinct gender records")
    
    logInfo("Dropping table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender if it exists")
    spark.sql("""
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender
    """)
    logInfo("Table dropped or did not exist")
    
    # Use Spark to clear the location instead of dbutils
    logInfo(f"Attempting to clear location if it exists: {delta_view_path}")
    try:
        # Check if the location exists and is not empty
        fs = spark._jvm.org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem.get(spark._jsc.hadoopConfiguration())
        path = spark._jvm.org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path(delta_view_path)
        if fs.exists(path):
            fs.delete(path, True)  # True for recursive delete
        logInfo(f"Successfully cleared path: {delta_view_path}")
    except Exception as clear_error:
        logInfo(f"Note: Could not clear path or path doesn't exist: {str(clear_error)}")
    
    logInfo("Creating table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender from view with specified location")
    spark.sql(f"""
    CREATE TABLE odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender
    USING delta
    LOCATION '{delta_view_path}'
    AS
    SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender
    """)
    
    table_count = spark.sql("SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender").collect()[0]['count']
    logInfo(f"Created table with {table_count} records at location: {delta_view_path}")
    
    logInfo("HR Gender dimension setup completed successfully")

except Exception as e:
    logError(f"Error in HR Gender dimension setup: {str(e)}")
    logException(e)
    raise e
finally:
    logInfo("Flushing logs")
    flushLogging()
